column1: The '''''Tolkien 2005 Souvenir Book''''' was produced in [[2010]] by [[The Tolkien Society]] and sent out to all attendees of the [[Tolkien 2005]] conference held at [[wikipedia:Aston University
column2: Aston University]], [[Birmingham]]. The book includes reports and photos from the event along with copies of the 19 news bulletins that were sent out.

column1: ** Including messages from [[John Howe]] and [[Brian Sibley]]
* '''Publicising Tolkien 2005''': The Road Goes Ever On
** Aston 2005 or A Long Weekend in Mor-door
* Dramatisation of parts of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: BBC Radio 4 adaptation]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
